final_poem:
Time's fragile thread weaves in and out
A tapestry of moments lost without
Echoes of memories past and gone
Fleeting whispers that refuse to be strong

Invisible hands tick clocks away
Marking lives as hours fade to gray
The weightlessness of seconds slips
Into the abyss, a moment's grip

Tides of time ebb and flow with ease
As hearts beat out a rhythmic peace
Their pulse insistent, wild and free
Within our chests, where moments be
